pos_mean_info_list.mean: 精密地；危急地；批评性地；用钻研眼光地
批评家，评论家；爱挑剔的人

word_mean_info__list.difference: 指极为危急或缺乏的状况，而这种状况标志一种转折点。
指情况紧急，急需解决问题。
通常指需要和缺乏的紧急程度。也指病情的严重。

word_group.brief_definition: 批判思维；批判思考；批判性想法

bilingual.target: 但是，批评的声音也越来越大。

bilingual.source: He examined the old coins with a critical eye, being a perfectionist.
bilingual.target: 因生性追求完美,他以批评的眼光检验着这些古币.

bilingual.source: Do not describe other people with critical words, say nothing of quarrel.
bilingual.target: 不要用批评的语言说别人,更不要恶言相向.

bilingual.source: Do not describe other people with critical words, say nothing of quarrel .
bilingual.target: 不要用批评的语言说别人，更不要恶言相向。

bilingual.source: Ramesses hatches a face-saving plan well-suited to this more critical era.
bilingual.target: 拉姆西策划了一场保全颜面的比较适合的计划来面对这个更多批评的时代。

bilingual.source: Ramesses hatches a face - saving plan well - suited to this more critical era.
bilingual.target: 拉姆西策划了一场保全颜面的比较适合的计划来面对这个更多批评的时代.

bilingual.source: For example, a critical comment here and there, a distasteful remark, and a bad joke.
bilingual.target: 例如，到处都有批评的评论、令人反感的话、糟糕的笑话。

bilingual.source: BLURR with his critical eye and sharp tongue states matter-of-factly, "He's got a lot to learn. "
bilingual.target: 用急先锋批评的眼光和犀利的言语来说，就是“他还要学习。”

bilingual.source: BLURR with his critical eye and sharp tongue states matter-of-factly , "He's got a lot to learn."
bilingual.target: 用急先锋批评的眼光和犀利的言语来说，就是“他还要学习。”

bilingual.source: The Critical Thoughts of New Historicism reveals the ideology of literary criticism from a new point.
bilingual.target: 新历史主义文学观从一个新的角度揭示了批评的意识形态性质.

list.abstract: CRITICAL（英[ˈkrɪtɪkl]，美[ˈkrɪtɪkl]），英语单词，为形容词，释义是指持相反意见的；批评的；决定性的等。短语搭配有critical state（临界状态）。例句有“It is conducive to critical thinking.（它有助于批判性思维。）” CRITICAL形容词类近义词有dangerous、crucial、final等。反义词有uncritical、noncritical。

yingyinNormal.en: First job out of college is critical, kid.
yingyinNormal.zh: 小子，大学毕业后的第一份工作至关重要。

yingyinNormal.en: This will become critical for China as demand is ever-increasing.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这对中国未来至关重要，因当下需求正与日俱增。

yingyinNormal.en: It is critical that he keeps his hand open and touches nothing.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他必须保持手掌打开避免任何接触。

yingyinNormal.en: And critical to that is full and rapid reusability of the rocket.
yingyinNormal.zh: 至关重要的是，火箭可以充分迅速地被重复使用。

yingyinNormal.en: Coal, this one critical resource supplies nearly half of America's electricity.
yingyinNormal.zh: 煤，这至关重要的能源，维持着近一半美国人的用电需求。

yingyinNormal.en: So the yogurt didn't work. I'll fire off a critical e-mail to the manufacturer.
yingyinNormal.zh: 看来酸奶是没起作用，我要火速去给生产商写邮件指责他们。

yingyinNormal.en: All very interesting, Sherlock, but the terror alert has been raised to critical.
yingyinNormal.zh: 都很有意思，夏洛克，但恐怖袭击预警等级已达到"危急"。

yingyinNormal.en: But I'm surprised you've been so critical. I thought you and Underwood were close.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但我没想到你立场这么鲜明。我以为你和安德伍德关系很好。

yingyinNormal.en: Every time your team rolls out an update, there's a possibility of a critical failure.
yingyinNormal.zh: 每次你的团队运行一次更新，都有出现重大故障的可能性。

yingyinNormal.en: 533 days of unplanned space travel where anything can go wrong. If it's mission critical, we die.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在计划之外的533任务，任何事情都可能发生，如果任务出问题，我们都回不去家。

yingyinNormal.en: I don't want to be critical. You got to be kidding me. This is not one of your more loveable traits.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不想显得在嫌弃你。你不是吧。但这个特质是你比较不讨喜的一个。

yingyinNormal.en: This will be the size of your new stomach. After gastric bypass surgery, portion control is critical.
yingyinNormal.zh: 之后你的胃大概就是这么大。胃旁路手术后，食量的控制至关重要。

yingyinNormal.en: And for families like the Wangs, this cutting-edge transportation is critical for their New Year exodus.
yingyinNormal.zh: 而对于王家人来说，这前沿的交通系统对他们新年回家意义非凡。

yingyinNormal.en: He's right. The portal is collapsing in on itself. We've got maybe two minutes before this goes critical.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他说得对，输送门开始崩溃了，距离完全颠覆还有两分钟时间。

yingyinNormal.en: Mr. Reese isn't answering his phone. A mission this critical, shouldn't we try to find him, bring him along?
yingyinNormal.zh: 里瑟先生不接电话，事关重大，我们不应该先找到他带他一起吗？

yingyinNormal.en: We don't update the hosts in cold storage. And the park hasn't had a critical failure in over 30 years. Meaning we're overdue.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们又不会更新冷藏库里的接待员，园区也有三十年没出现过重大故障了。早该出故障了。

yingyinNormal.en: This magical moment is so critical that a majority of men and women have reported losing their attraction to someone after a bad first kiss.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这个神奇的时刻非常关键，以致于很多男人女人都说过，他们在糟糕的初吻经验后就对对方失去兴趣了。

yingyinNormal.en: Look. There's Inductive Reasoning. There's Deja Vu. There's Language Processing. There's Deja Vu. There's Critical Thinking. There's Deja Vu.
yingyinNormal.zh: 看啊，那是逻辑推理中心，那是似曾相识那是语言处理中心，那是似曾相识那是批判思维中心，那是似曾相识。

yingyinNormal.en: This is a very critical time right now. If you feel yourself reaching for that phone, then you go shoe shopping, you get your butt in a bubble bath.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这段时间很重要，一旦你发现自己的手又伸向电话，你就去购物，或者给你的屁股洗个泡泡浴。

yingyinNormal.en: Starting at 1:00 p.m., we'll be assigning every volunteer to a search team. Each team is in charge of a single section of the critical 12-square-mile radius.
yingyinNormal.zh: 从下午一点开始，我们把志愿者分成若干小组。每个小组负责一块区域在方圆十二平方英里内展开搜索。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 批评；批判；指责；评论；评价；考证
n. 评论
adv. 危急地；批评性地；批判性地；严重地；苛求地
adj. 持相反意见的；批评的；评论（性）的；有可能成为灾难的；危急的；临界的；关键性的；决定性的；附有详细深刻分析与评论的；病情严重的
v. 批评；批判；指责；评论；评价

word_family.mean: n. 批评者；评论家；批评家

sense_info_list.en: having a decisive or crucial importance in the success, failure, or existence of something

examination_example.sentence: All good targets should have multiple criteria relating to <highlight>critical</highlight> factors such as time, money, quality and customer feedback.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 所有好的目标都应该有多个与关键因素相关的标准，例如时间、金钱、质量和客户反馈。

examination_example.sentence: The goal of grade forgiveness is more about encouraging students to retake courses <highlight>critical</highlight> to their degree program and graduation.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 分数宽恕的目标，更多是鼓励学生重修对他们的学位计划和毕业至关重要的课程。

examination_example.sentence: When it began to seem attractive to girls, part of what defined them as female, at least for the first few <highlight>critical</highlight> years.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当它（粉色）开始对女孩子有吸引力时，也成为将她们定义为女性的一部分，至少在成长最初的关键几年是这样的。

examination_example.sentence: We also need to admit good arguments by opponents and to apply the same <highlight>critical</highlight> standards to ourselves.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们还需要承认对手的好论点，并对自己运用同样的评判标准。

examination_example.sentence: A Rise in <highlight>Critical</highlight> Skills for Sharing News Online
examination_example.sentence_trans: 《网络信息分享中批判式思维技能的提升》

examination_example.sentence: Scientific work calls for a <highlight>critical</highlight> mind.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 科学工作需要批判性思维。

sense_info_list.en: expressing adverse or disapproving comments or judgments

examination_example.sentence: So when young people are <highlight>critical</highlight> of an over-tweeting president, they reveal a mental discipline in thinking skills.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 因此，当年轻人对一位发推特过多的总统有意见时，他们展现出思维技能方面的精神自制力。

sense_info_list.en: (of a situation or problem) having the potential to become disastrous; at a point of crisis

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 形容词后缀, 表示"...的"

word_usage.usage:
表示“重要的”
vital语气较强，指对于某人或某事成功或继续存在是至关重要的。
critical指对将来发生的事而言十分重要的。
key指作用十分重要或不能缺少的。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 表示“紧要的”、“危急的”，指疾病、时局、事态等处于危急中或接近转折点，并暗示临近结果的产生或问题的解决。
表示“极其重要的”、“不可缺少的”，可指与生命有关或维持生命所必需的，有时也可指充满生机的。
表示“关键的”、“决定性的”，尤指确定使人感到恐惧、担忧的局势，并意味着决定性或最终的后果会随之而来。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 有鉴别力的; 审慎的

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 批评；批判；指责；评论；评价；考证
n. 评论
adj. 不加批评的；无鉴别力的；不符合分析批评原则的
adv. 危急地；批评性地；批判性地；严重地；苛求地
adj. 持相反意见的；批评的；评论（性）的；有可能成为灾难的；危急的；临界的；关键性的；决定性的；附有详细深刻分析与评论的；病情严重的
v. 批评；批判；指责；评论；评价

word_family.mean: n. 批评者；评论家；批评家

sense_info_list.en: having a decisive or crucial importance in the success, failure, or existence of something

examination_example.sentence: But there's no denying ethical leadership is at least a <highlight>critical</highlight> step in the right direction.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但不可否认，有道德的领导至少是朝着正确方向迈出的关键一步。

examination_example.sentence: It is also <highlight>critical</highlight> for socially charged neuroscience issues such as the therapeutic potential of stem cell therapy for regenerative diseases.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这对于社会所关注的神经科学问题也至关重要，例如再生疾病干细胞疗法的治疗潜力。

sense_info_list.en: expressing adverse or disapproving comments or judgments

examination_example.sentence: But Schellenberg remains highly <highlight>critical</highlight> of how the concept of plasticity has been applied in his field.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是舍伦贝格仍然对可塑性概念在他的领域中的应用持高度批评态度。

examination_example.sentence: It is conducive to <highlight>critical</highlight> thinking.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它有助于批判性思维。

examination_example.sentence: Ego aside, a third advantage is that the emotional neutrality of indifferent relationships has been found to enhance <highlight>critical</highlight> evaluation.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 抛开自我不谈，“冷漠关系”的第三个好处是这一关系中的情感中立可以增强批判性评价。

sense_info_list.en: (of a situation or problem) having the potential to become disastrous; at a point of crisis

examination_example.sentence: However, during <highlight>critical</highlight> situations, especially when a threat is perceived, the outer core loses control and fails to regulate the impulses.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，在危急情况下，特别是当感知到威胁时，外核失去控制，无法调节冲动。

sense_info_list.en: expressing or involving an analysis of the merits and faults of a work of literature, music, or art
sense_info_list.zh: 有鉴别力的; 审慎的

examination_example.sentence: "I would think that it makes them better people, more <highlight>critical</highlight>, just wiser in general," he said.
examination_example.sentence_trans: “我认为这让他们成为更好的人，更审慎，更聪明，”他说。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 批判思维；批判思考；批判性想法

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 批评；批判；指责；评论；评价；考证
n. 评论
adj. 自我批评的；自我苛责的
adj. 不加批评的；无鉴别力的；不符合分析批评原则的
adv. 危急地；批评性地；批判性地；严重地；苛求地
adj. 持相反意见的；批评的；评论（性）的；有可能成为灾难的；危急的；临界的；关键性的；决定性的；附有详细深刻分析与评论的；病情严重的
v. 批评；批判；指责；评论；评价

word_family.mean: n. 批评者；评论家；批评家

sense_info_list.en: having a decisive or crucial importance in the success; failure; or existence of something

examination_example.sentence: It fosters children's creativity, cooperation, and problem-solving skills—all of which are <highlight>critical</highlight> for a 21st-century workforce.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它培养孩子的创造力、合作精神和解决问题的能力——这些对21世纪的劳动力来说都是至关重要的。

examination_example.sentence: So is five seconds on the floor the <highlight>critical</highlight> threshold (门槛) that separates a piece of eatable food from a case of food poisoning?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在地板上放置5秒钟是将可食用食物与会中毒食物区分开的关键门槛吗？

examination_example.sentence: What does the author think is <highlight>critical</highlight> to kids' education?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 作者认为什么对孩子的教育至关重要？

sense_info_list.en: expressing adverse or disapproving comments or judgments

examination_example.sentence: Most of them are not reading long articles or books that explore deep themes and require <highlight>critical</highlight> thinking and reflection.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们中的大多数人不是在阅读探索深层主题、需要批判性思维和反思的长篇文章或书籍。

examination_example.sentence: By enhancing students' ability to think in a <highlight>critical</highlight> way.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 通过提高学生批判性思维的能力。

examination_example.sentence: Imagine a drug that could enhance a child's creativity and <highlight>critical</highlight> thinking.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 想象一种可以增强孩子创造力和批判性思维的药物。

sense_info_list.en: (of a situation or problem) having the potential to become disastrous; at a point of crisis

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 通常指需要和缺乏的紧急程度。也指病情的严重。
指极为危急或缺乏的状况，而这种状况标志一种转折点。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 严重的; 令人担忧的

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 批判思维；批判思考；批判性想法

examination_example.sentence: Like every other skill, <highlight>critical</highlight> thinking takes practice.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 像其他所有技能一样，批判性思维需要练习。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Critical</highlight> thinking is important and stops us from making poor choices.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 批判性思维很重要，可以阻止我们做出错误的选择。

examination_example.sentence: While you are growing in <highlight>critical</highlight> thinking, you'll become a wiser and more thoughtful person.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当你在批判性思维中成长时，你会成为一个更睿智、更有思想的人。
